content.rendered: The solar monitoring system used for monitor operating of solar panels. It also offer information regarding power consumption and optimizing energy usage. Leons solar monitoring system based on Wireless connectivity with rang up to 30 meter & RS485 for wire connectivity. It equipped with battery back-up and mesh network connection. It provide energy generation values at your fingertips.
